content:
Craft an item of type: pink_bed
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 19, "index": 38}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 40}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 42}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a pink bed, I first need to craft warped planks. Warped planks require either a warped stem, stripped warped stem, warped hyphae or stripped warped hyphae. Therefore, I will first move the warped hyphae from slot 23 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: pink_bed
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 19, "index": 38}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 40}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 42}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the warped planks, I need to move them out of the crafting grid into a free slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: pink_bed
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 19, "index": 38}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 40}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 42}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a pink_bed, I need to place three pink_wools on top of three planks in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one of the pink_wools from slot 43 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: pink_bed
inventory=[{"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 19, "index": 38}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 40}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 47, "index": 42}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to move another pink_wool from slot 43 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1
